backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High-level descriptions of key frontend files including styling, layout, sections, and content modules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component wiring navigation, hero, and content sections with smooth scrolling refs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying branding, resource links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with headline, description, CTA buttons, and hero illustration image.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Simple layout wrapper providing a full‑height flex container.
frontend/src/components/MarketingNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-aware styling and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/CoreGro: Renders a section showing core growth tips and actionable checklists using cards and mapped content from growthGuidance.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays an FAQ section using an accordion with predefined questions and answers about social media growth.
frontend/src/components/sections/Platfor: Provides platform-specific social media tips in a tabbed interface, each with icon, color, and mapped tip lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/ToolsRe: Shows categorized tools and resources in cards, each with icons and external links for content planning, design, analytics, and checklists.
frontend/src/content/growthGuidance.ts: Defines interfaces and exports arrays of growth tips and checklists used across UI sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state and login/logout flow using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a placeholder hook that exposes actor and loading state for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode values, typography, and layout utilities for the site theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, features, requirements, and metadata for a social media growth tips website.
